titles.en: Chapter 38 – The words (to be spoken) during seeing the funeral (coffin)
Chapter 39 – The Sunnah regarding carrying the coffin

titles.ar: باب أَنَّ الْمَيِّتَ يُؤْذَنُ بِهِ النَّاسُ
titles.en: Chapter 37 – The deceased, the people should be proclaimed with it (his news of death)
Chapter 38 – The words (to be spoken) during seeing the funeral (coffin)

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: مرسل كالحسن - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (4/5)

narrator_chain.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنْ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ الْمُغِيرَةِ عَنْ أَبَانٍ لَا أَعْلَمُهُ إِلَّا ذَكَرَهُ عَنْ أَبِي حَمْزَةَ قَالَ

text: كَانَ عَلِيُّ بْنُ الْحُسَيْنِ ( عليه السلام ) إِذَا رَأَى جَنَازَةً قَدْ أَقْبَلَتْ قَالَ الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي لَمْ يَجْعَلْنِي مِنَ السَّوَادِ الْمُخْتَرَمِ .

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Abdullah Bin Al Mgheira, from Aban, not knowing except that it was mentioned from Abu Hamza who said,

‘Ali<sup>asws </sup> Bin Al-Husayn<sup>asws</sup>, whenever he<sup>asws</sup> saw the funeral (coffin) to have faced, said: ‘The Praise is for Allah<sup>azwj</sup> Who did not Make me<sup>asws</sup> to be from the perished masses’.
en.sarwar: 1. I do not know about him more of his name - from abu Hamzah who has said the following: “Ali ibn al-Husayn, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, on seeing a dead body brought near, would say, ‘All praise belongs to Allah who has not brought my life to an end.’”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: مرفوع - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (14/6)

narrator_chain.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ مُوسَى بْنِ الْحَسَنِ عَنْ أَبِي الْحَسَنِ النَّهْدِيِّ رَفَعَهُ قَالَ

text: كَانَ أَبُو جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) إِذَا رَأَى جَنَازَةً قَالَ الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي لَمْ يَجْعَلْنِي مِنَ السَّوَادِ الْمُخْتَرَمِ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Musa Bin Al Hassan, from Abu Al Hassan Al Nahdy, raising it, said,
‘Abu Ja’far<sup>asws</sup>, whenever he<sup>asws</sup> saw a funeral, said: ‘The Praise is for Allah<sup>azwj</sup> Who did not Make me to be from the perished masses’.
en.sarwar: 2. Muhammad ibn Yahya has narrated from Musa ibn al-Hassan from abu al-Hassan al-Nahdi in a marfu‘ manner who has said the following: “Abu Ja‘far, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, when seeing a dead person would say, ‘All praise belongs to Allah who has not placed me among the masses whose lives have already ended.’”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: ضعيف - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (14/6)

narrator_chain.text: حُمَيْدٌ عَنِ ابْنِ سَمَاعَةَ عَنْ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ جَبَلَةَ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ مَسْعُودٍ الطَّائِيِّ عَنْ عَنْبَسَةَ بْنِ مُصْعَبٍ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ

text: قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ ( صلى الله عليه وآله ) مَنِ اسْتَقْبَلَ جَنَازَةً أَوْ رَآهَا فَقَالَ.

اللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ هَذَا مَا وَعَدَنَا اللَّهُ وَ رَسُولُهُ وَ صَدَقَ اللَّهُ وَ رَسُولُهُ اللَّهُمَّ زِدْنَا إِيمَاناً وَ تَسْلِيماً الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي تَعَزَّزَ بِالْقُدْرَةِ وَ قَهَرَ الْعِبَادَ بِالْمَوْتِ لَمْ يَبْقَ فِي السَّمَاءِ مَلَكٌ إِلَّا بَكَى رَحْمَةً لِصَوْتِهِ

en.hubeali: Humeyd, from Ibn Sama’at, from Abdullah Bin Jabala, from Muhammad Bin Masoud Al Ta’iy, from Anbasa Bin Mus’ab,
(It has been narrated)from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘Rasool-Allah<sup>saww</sup>  said: ‘The one who comes across a funeral or sees it, so he should say,

‘Allah<sup>azwj</sup> is the Greatest! This is what Allah<sup>azwj</sup> and His<sup>azwj</sup> Rasool<sup>saww</sup> Promised us, and Allah<sup>azwj</sup> and His<sup>azwj</sup> Rasool<sup>saww</sup> spoke the truth. O Allah<sup>azwj</sup>! Increase us in Eman (faith) and submission. The Praise is for Allah<sup>azwj</sup> Who Honoured us with the Ordainment, and Subdued the servants with the death. There does not remain an Angel in the sky except that he weeps pitifully for his Voice’.
en.sarwar: 3. Humayd has narrated from ibn Sama‘ah from ‘Abd Allah ibn Jabalah from Muhammad ibn Mas’ud al-Ta’i from ‘Anbasah ibn Mus’ab who has said the following: “Abu ‘Abd Allah, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, has said that the Messenger of Allah has said, ‘If one finds a dead body brought from the opposite direction or just sees one and says, “Allah is great. This is what Allah and His Messenger have told us will happen to us and Allah and His Messenger have indeed spoken the truth. O Lord, increase our belief and submission. All praise belongs to Allah who is Most Majestic due to His power and who has subdued people by death,” no angel is left in the heavens but will weep out of sympathy for the tone of his voice.””’
